io.github.miquelo.tools.packer

Interface PackerCommand

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PackerBuildCommand

    public interface PackerCommand
    Attributes and life cycle contracts of a Packer command. Each command must determine Packer the resulting command name, additional arguments and the working directory. In addition, it can control an specific task life cycle in order to fulfill its command requirements.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Object> getArguments()
      Arguments passed to the command.
      String getName()
      Name of the command.
      Optional<File> getWorkingDir()
      Desired working directory for the command to run.
      boolean init(PackerCommandLogger logger, TimeoutHandler timeoutHandler)
      Life cycle initialization step.
      PackerCommandFailureCode mapFailureCode(int errorCode)
      Map underlying command execution error code to command failure.
      void onAbort()
      Callback called when command execution is aborted.
      void onFailure(PackerCommandFailureCode failureCode)
      Callback called when command fails.
      void onSuccess()
      Callback called when command succeeds.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Name of the command.

      • getArguments

        List<Object> getArguments()
        Arguments passed to the command.

      • getWorkingDir

        Optional<File> getWorkingDir()
        Desired working directory for the command to run. It returns Optional.empty() if default directory must be used.

      • init

        boolean init(PackerCommandLogger logger,
             TimeoutHandler timeoutHandler)
      throws PackerCommandException,
             TimeoutException
        Life cycle initialization step. It may prepare all that the command needs to be ran. Return flag determines if command will continue running or it must be skipped.
        Parameters:
        logger - Logger passed by command task.
        timeoutHandler - Timeout handler aligned with command task.
        Returns:
        true if command must continue running, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        PackerCommandException - When initialization error has occurred.
        TimeoutException - When timeout has reached during initialization.

      • onSuccess

        void onSuccess()
        Callback called when command succeeds.

      • onFailure

        void onFailure(PackerCommandFailureCode failureCode)
        Callback called when command fails.
        Parameters:
        failureCode - Related failure code.

      • onAbort

        void onAbort()
        Callback called when command execution is aborted.

      • mapFailureCode

        PackerCommandFailureCode mapFailureCode(int errorCode)
        Map underlying command execution error code to command failure.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - Underlying execution error code value.
        Returns:
        Mapped failure code.
